game.shortDescriptionEn: Find 100 cats hiding in the cosy autumnal town of Maple Hollow in this cute hand-drawn hidden object game by Travellin Cats - the original viral hidden cats game creator! Can you find them all?

reviewHighlights.text: Really cool, loved the pumpkins. Surprised I couldn't interact with the birds. Ghost was amazing too!! Felt a bit short but it's really nice for Fall...
this one was really cute and fun as usual, but i was NOT prepared for the ghost - genuinely scared the shit out of me lmao. did not expect that at all...
